_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
December 20th, 3:03 PM
Good afternoon riders and skiers! We had a rough start this morning with delays and holds due to icing, but thanks to our mountain ops teams we are firing on all cylinders. Mt. Ellen made its season debut this morning, with 2 inches of fresh snow as a bonus! Plus, we've opened over 30 new trails today, doubling our skiable terrain. Tomorrow will open with cloudy skies, temps will rise slightly, mid 30s at the base and mid 20s at the summit, winds may affect lift operations. Tomorrow expect similar snow conditions, firm machine grooming on 37 of our trails and variable conditions throughout the mountain. Snowmaking will be staying put on Sleeper, Sugarbear Road, and Riemergasse, using caution as conditions vary around snow guns and visibility is low. 

Tomorrow we'll be getting down on 362 skiable acres served by 9 lifts and 82 open trails. Ropes have dropped on loads of natural terrain, please use caution as coverage is thin, and suggested for experts only. Hiking for Castlerock and North Lynx is planned to open for tomorrow, run outs for this terrain is extremely thin, use caution as conditions could damage equipment.

Operations switched to weekend hours, which means GMX, Super Bravo, and Heaven's Gate lifts spin from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM and all other lifts load at 9:00 AM. Reminder, terrain off upper mountain lifts is for advanced skiers and riders only. Remember that Local Passes are now only valid at Mt. Ellen on Saturdays. The Sugarbush Parks crew has assembled a wonderful freestyle setup for opening day at Mt. Ellen with 14 features and 2 jumps. Plus, join us on Dec 20th at 3:00 PM, at Green Mountain Lodge for our Champagne Cowbell Party, celebrating Mt. Ellen's return with friends and family. Check out all of our winter events!

All uphill travel routes are now open at both Lincoln Peak and Mt. Ellen, check out our uphill travel policy for more info.

Have an Ikon Base Pass? Come ski before 12/25 and earn a voucher for an unrestricted lift ticket for yourself to be used any day here for the rest of the season. Grab up to five of these tickets simply by skiing and riding here before Christmas. Don't miss out on all of our deals including 50% off December lodging through December 26th.
